腷字的基本解释

腷
bì
〔腷臆〕烦闷；心情郁结，如“寄身锋刃，腷腷谁诉！”
〔腷膊〕象声词，如“腷腷战声喧。”

腷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》符逼切，入職，並。］
(1)郁结。参见“腷臆”。
(2)见“腷膊”。

腷字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　腷； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页989第28
【廣韻】符逼切【集韻】弼力切，?音愎。【廣韻】腷臆，意不泄也。【古兩頭纖纖詩】腷腷膊膊雞初鳴，磊磊落落向曙星。【集韻】或作服。

腷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
腷字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Boiled
bì
〔藷臆〕 Depressed; feeling frustrated, such as "Send yourself to a sharp edge, who will complain!"
〔腷巷〕Onomatopoeia, such as "funny wars noisy."
Boiled
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" is forced to cut, entered, and merged. ]
(1) Stagnation. See "cosy".
(2) See "Fitness".
Boiled

[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　腷; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 989 28
[Guang Yun] Fu Biqie [Jiyun] Bi Liqie, sound frustrated. [Guang Yun] Embarrassed and unwilling to let go. [Ancient Poem with Two Slender Heads] The crouched cock crowed at the beginning, and fell to the dawn star. [Ji Yun] Or take service.
